name: Top Gun Rider ( Free Racing and Shooting Car Kids Games )
name_original: Top Gun Rider ( Free Racing and Shooting Car Kids Games )
description:
C'mon take a deep breath... You are about to take on the most thrilling ride of your life on this brutal freeway where vigilance is order of the day and carelessness is death itself.

Ride your motorbike at insane speeds and blast anyone in front of you.Top Gun Rider is a frantically paced bike racing and shooting game.

Your reflexes will mean the difference between surviving or crashing in spectacular fashion. Do you have what it takes to survive?

Features:

• Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra smooth tilt controls.

• Eye popping high definition 3D graphics

• Environments that change every few minutes you play.

• OpenFeint leaderboards, achievements and challenges

• Easy but fun game mechanics.

• Hours of addictive gaming!
